definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Huaihai Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War, considered the determining battle of the war

sentences.english: How are lost crew numbers replenished post-battle?
sentences.chinese: 在海战结束后如何补充船员数量？

sentences.english: The enemy warships were disengaged from the battle after suffering heavy casualties.
sentences.chinese: 在遭受惨重伤亡后，敌舰退出了海战。

sentences.english: The N81 Division provides analysis of all aspects of naval warfare support.
sentences.chinese: 该N81科负责提供各方面海战的分析支持。

sentences.english: The sea battle of Actium decides the fate of the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 亚克兴海战决定了罗马帝国的命运。

sentences.english: A warship involved in a battle would encounter the assault from enemy anti-warship weapons.
sentences.chinese: 舰船在海战时，会遭到敌方反舰武器的攻击。

sentences.english: Multi-platform cooperative engagement is inevitable trend of the future naval warfare under condition of information.
sentences.chinese: 多平台协同作战是信息条件下未来海战的必然趋势。

sentences.english: There was overwhelming opposition to empowering him to wage a declared naval war.
sentences.chinese: 绝大多数人反对授权他进行不宣而战的海战。

sentences.english: Still learning English with a workbook?
sentences.chinese: 还在靠题海战术学习英语吗？

sentences.english: In modern naval warfare, men seldom fight hand to hand.
sentences.chinese: 在现代海战中，很少有短兵相接的场面。

sentences.english: How can you say you disagree when the majority of your classmates do not?
sentences.chinese: 绝大多数人反对授权他进行不宣而战的海战。

sentences.english: The event was prior to the battle of Huaihai.
sentences.chinese: 这件事件在淮海战役之前。

sentences.english: The Huai-Hai Campaign was essential to the victory of the War of Liberation.
sentences.chinese: 淮海战役对解放战争的胜利至关重要。

sentences.english: We observe that salute of American comrades, land and sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们观礼看致敬来自美国伙伴，陆海战。

sentences.english: He took part in a great naval battle.
The floor was sometimes caulked and filled with water to a depth of about a meter for mock sea battles.
sentences.chinese: 地板有时灌满了深度约一米的水，以模拟海战。

sentences.english: The Huai-Hai Campaign was essential to the victory of the War of    Liberation.
sentences.chinese: 淮海战役对解放战争的胜利至关重要。
